translated: Birth Stories🔽The Ones Gone Thus🔽The Ones Gone Thus
The One Who Went to the Bad Destinations

original: “Yassa maṅgalā samūhatāse,🔽Uppātā supinā ca lakkhaṇā ca;
analyzed: yassa maṅgalā samūhatāse  uppātā supinā ca lakkhaṇā ca
translated: “For one who has abandoned all that is auspicious,🔽All portents, dreams, and signs,
Having gone beyond the faults of the auspicious,

analyzed: yuga yoga adhigataḥ na jātum eti iti
translated: One never again goes to the yoke of the pair.”
The Auspicious Birth Story is the seventh.
